PARAGRAPH.STRING: (pronounced [IPA: [ʁəne levɛk]]) (August 24, 1922 - November 1, 1987) was a reporter, a minister of the government of Quebec, Canada, (1960 - 1966), the founder of the Parti Québécois political party, and 23rd Premier of Quebec (November 25, 1976 - October 3, 1985).
was the first French-Canadian political leader since confederation to attempt, through a referendum, to negotiate political independence for Quebec.
was a recipient of the title Grand Officer of the French Legion of Honour.
